host_about:
We are outdoor enthusiasts who love our little home in Tahoe City. Residents for 20 years we are so happy to call this special place home. We work hard and play hard, the best motto to have in Tahoe. We love the snow, the wind, the sun and the rain. Every season is a great season in Tahoe.

name: Cottonwood Condo Bozeman
description: Enjoy a bright and cozy newly remodeled condo at this centrally-located place in the Valley West area of Bozeman.  Halfway between Bridger Bowl and Big Sky for skiing, and walkable to shops/resteaurants/groceries at Ferguson Farms.  Dog park on site and 2 parking spots (one covered) as well as all utilities and Internet included! Fully stocked kitchen with everything you need to have a nice dinner on the balcony, or cozy up on the oversized West Elm sofa in front of the electric fireplace.
host_about:
I love spaces! I love spaces so much that I got into Real Estate,  and now I get to visit new spaces for a living. 

So of course when I travel I like to visit not only new cities and places, but also new houses and spaces.  Unfortunately I’ve been too busy working on various projects over the past few years to travel much, but I escape when I can!!

I’m also in the process of acquiring a place to build my own dream vacation cabin - which I will be happily sharing with the BNB community in the (semi-near-ish) future.  

That said, a few things about me... I love the “golden rule,” hate ignorance; love skiing and hiking, hate the ugly boots that go with them; love reading books, hate getting older and (almost) needing reading glasses; love karma, hate when it catches up to someone too late ;).  

I appreciate anyone who shares their space with me, and promise to treat it as I would my own - ie I’ll leave my boots at the door before I go curl up with a good book in the comfiest chair. 

Cheers! 
AC

name: Cozy Studio in Historic Downtown
description: This stylish and spacious second-floor guest studio is tucked behind our main home, offering both privacy and a prime location. Just steps from downtown’s vibrant Main Street and the scenic overlooks of Peet’s Hill, it’s also within walking distance of the MSU campus. Sun-drenched interiors, contemporary appliances, and thoughtful amenities make this an easy, comfortable retreat for couples, solo travelers, or small families.
host_about: We have lived in Bozeman for over 30 years and feel so lucky to call this beautiful place home. We deeply appreciate everything this area has to offer—especially the access to nature, the strong sense of community, and the pace of life. We spend a lot of time outdoors—whether it’s gardening, hiking, fishing, or skiing. We share our home with two large, lovable dogs and a sweet orange tabby cat—all of whom may be around to say a quick hello.

name: Outdoors-Person/Remote Worker Basecamp Bedroom
description:
This room is ideal for the individual traveler who wants a clean and comfortable basecamp and the ability to work remotely from their room and enjoy the many recreational opportunities around Bozeman.

The room has a stand up desk and lamp, a Twin XL bed and generous closet. Clean towels and bedding are provided for each room. This room is the most affordble of the three rooms we offer, as the others can accomodate up to two people.

This rooms shares a full bath with one other room.
host_about: We are an active family, and Dave and I, along with our adult children are often hiking, skiing, running or swimming.  We have wonderful neighbors and a lovely area that we enjoy sharing with our Airbnb guests.

name: Beautiful MT Townhome Retreat
description:
I’ll be temporarily relocating to Boston and am looking to rent my beloved home. This is a perfect opportunity for a quiet, responsible tenant (ideally an individual or couple—sorry, no pets) to enjoy a beautiful space in a serene setting.

This modern 3-bed, 3-bath townhouse is a 10 min drive to downtown. It features high-end furnishings, and locally made custom pieces. The home is thoughtfully decorated and well cared for—ideal for someone who will treat it with the same love and attention.
host_about:
Hello! My name is Lindsay and I live in Bozeman but am originally from coastal Massachusetts. I joined Airbnb to travel freely, and also host guests in my townhome in Montana. I enjoy meeting new people, experiencing adventure, and all things health/wellness related. I work full time remote as a senior product designer in fintech.

As a host: My priority is providing a quiet, comfortable, safe and stylish space for guests while they visit Bozeman.

As a guest: Treating ones home as if it were my own, with respect.

name: Comfy downtown Apt - monthly
description:
Spacious, fully furnished 1 bedroom sunny basement apartment one block from Main Street. Walking distance to shopping, trails, and MSU. Close to Streamline bus.

New floors, breakfast bar, and kitchen appliances, Full laundry, parking spot, and private entrance. Warm in the winter and cool in the summer! This is not a STR. 30 days or more required.
neighborhood_overview: Downtown Bozeman Apartment one (1) block from Main Street. A car isn’t necessary. Grocery, restaurants, shopping, health club, yoga studios, theaters and music venues are all 1-4 blocks away.
host_about: Welcome and thanks for checking out SoBo Cottage! I'm a longtime Bozeman-ite, graduating from Bozeman High and Montana State University after spending my youth traveling the world with my family in the military. I live just a few blocks from SoBo Cottage and am excited to share my home and wonderful community with you!

name: Cozy Cottage 1 Block to Main St
description:
Stay in the heart of Bozeman at this charming and private 1-bedroom, 1-bath cottage just one block from Historic Main Street. Nestled on its own quiet lot behind 303 E Olive, this peaceful retreat offers the best of both worlds: unbeatable downtown access with the feel of a hidden hideaway.

Perfect for couples, solo travelers, or remote workers, the home blends historic charm with modern essentials, creating an inviting and comfortable base for your Montana adventure.
host_about:
I'm a Bozeman native who lives in Austin with my wife, four daughters and our goldendoodle, Burrbon. We've lived in Chicago, Baltimore, and perhaps one day we'll be back in Montana. Until then, we love getting up there to visit when we can. We love the Sweet Pea festival and skiing Bridger and Big Sky. 

We love travel, adventure and creating memories together as a family.

name: Downtown Victorian House - Little Pink Houses
description: Stay in the heart of downtown Bozeman! This charming 1890s pink brick Victorian puts you steps from Bozeman’s top dining, shops & vibrant nightlife—then unwind in a private, lilac-lined backyard oasis; your hidden retreat. The best of Bozeman is literally at your doorstep!
host_about:
Welcome to my home!  I love this fun town and am happy to share it with you.

I grew up in the military; moving around, traveling to amazing places, and forming life-long relationships with amazing people.  Now that I no longer move around, having my homes in Airbnb is a great way to have new people come my way!

I live in Bozeman, MT and take advantage of all there is to offer. Love finding the hidden treasures in this state.  I have rental homes in Bozeman and Livingston, MT and Sun Valley (Ketchum), ID.  They are all in the downtown areas, all in wonderful little towns.  Someday, I may find myself beep bopping from one to the other.

I currently sell real estate in Montana, so if you come this way and fall in love, like everyone does... you know who to call!

If you do stay at one of my homes, I do hope you enjoy it.  

Kathi

name: Pagoda Peaks - Modern Luxury Near Bozeman Beach
description: Welcome to Pagoda Peaks, your serene Bozeman escape! Overlooking Bozeman Beach with unobstructed views of the Bridger Mountains, this stunning home invites you to paddle board, swim, or explore nearby walking trails. Thoughtfully curated by a professional interior designer, each piece inside is collected from travels across Asia and beyond. Crafted for slow mornings, golden hours, and unforgettable stays. Welcome to Bozeman, “the most livable town."
neighborhood_overview:
Located in the highly sought-after Bridger Vale community, this home sits directly on Bozeman Beach, offering easy access to walking trails, paddleboarding, and mountain views right outside your door. With a peaceful, residential feel and stunning views of the Bridger Mountains, it’s the perfect blend of quiet retreat and central location.

You’re just:

5 minutes to Historic Downtown Bozeman – known for its vibrant local shops, restaurants, coffee spots, and lively art scene
15 minutes to Bozeman Yellowstone International Airport (BZN)
1 hour 30 minutes to the North Entrance of Yellowstone National Park (via Gardiner) – perfect for a scenic day trip filled with wildlife and geothermal wonders
1 hour to Big Sky Resort – for world-class skiing, hiking, and mountain adventures
This location offers the best of all worlds: modern comfort, serene surroundings, and quick access to everything that makes Bozeman unforgettable.
host_about: Welcome to our Airbnb! We are the proud owners of Unwritten Stays, a company dedicated to managing and owning exceptional vacation rentals. Our passion for real estate and hospitality drives us to create unique and memorable experiences for our guests. Whether you're seeking a cozy retreat or an adventurous getaway, we strive to provide the perfect setting for your stay.

Welcome to Bozeman, MT where skiing, fishing, hiking and Yellowstone National Park are at hand.

Book now and experience Bozeman like a local.

name: Downtown Bozeman Retreat
description:
Welcome to your stylish and sustainable Bozeman retreat—an inviting, renovated upstairs guest suite offering 1,100 sq. ft. of comfort in the heart of downtown.

This private unit features its own entrance and a fully equipped kitchen, making it perfect for extended stays or cozy weekends. Please note that the lower level of the home is occupied by a long-term tenant, and the driveway is reserved for their use. Street parking is required, but it's typically easy to find nearby.
neighborhood_overview: Bozeman is known as “the most livable place” for good reason. Enjoy world-renowned fly fishing, and stunning mountains for hiking, mountain biking, rock climbing, skiing, hunting, and backcountry exploring. Yellowstone National Park and abundant wildlife are also nearby. Don’t miss out on Bozeman’s city experience - explore the vibrant arts and culture scene with main street festivals, farmers markets, cultural centers, museums, symphonies, theaters, and art galleries.

name: Orren North | Downtown Luxury & Bespoke Living
description: Welcome to Orren North, your downtown luxury and bespoke living! Just two blocks from Bozeman’s Main Street, this newly built escape offers modern architecture, high-end furnishings, and a chef’s kitchen that’s top of the line. Whether you’re exploring local restaurants, hiking nearby trails, or unwinding in sleek comfort after a day out, Atelier North is your gateway to Bozeman’s most elevated experience.
neighborhood_overview:
Orren North is located in the heart of Bozeman’s historic Northside neighborhood, a charming and highly walkable area just 2.5 blocks from Main Street. The location strikes the perfect balance between a quiet residential feel and instant access to Bozeman’s bustling downtown.
Stroll or bike to some of the city's best restaurants, breweries, coffee shops, boutiques, and the seasonal farmers market. You’re also just a few minutes from popular local parks, Bozeman Beach, and the trail systems that weave through the city.

For those looking to explore beyond Bozeman, this address offers easy day trips to Big Sky Resort (about 1 hour), Bridger Bowl (25 minutes), and the iconic Yellowstone National Park (just under 1.5 hours).

Whether you're here for adventure or relaxation, the location of Atelier North places you at the center of it all, where local culture meets Montana’s great outdoors.

name: Bridger Vale Retreat
description:
Wake up to these mountain views and step straight onto the trails at this luxury 4BR/4BA Bridger Vale retreat. With designer interiors, a chef’s kitchen, and spa-inspired suites, every detail is crafted for comfort and style. Spend mornings by Bozeman Pond, explore nearby hiking, skiing, and Yellowstone, then return to unwind in your private sanctuary. Where modern luxury meets Montana’s wild beauty.

STR23-00186
neighborhood_overview:
Nestled in the sought-after Bridger Vale town home community, this home offers a rare balance of quiet nature and close in convenience. Step directly from your back door to Bozeman Pond Park, a favorite spot for paddle boarding, fishing, and peaceful walks and connect to miles of scenic trails for hiking, running, or biking.

Despite its serene setting, you’re only minutes from downtown Bozeman, where you’ll find award winning restaurants, art galleries, boutique shops, and a lively local scene. For winter adventure, Bridger Bowl Ski Area is less than 30 minutes away, while Yellowstone National Park is an easy day trip.

The neighborhood itself is new, thoughtfully designed, and community oriented, giving guests the feel of a modern mountain enclave with easy access to everything Bozeman has to offer.

Whether you’re here for the trails, the powder, the culture, or simply the views, Bridger Vale puts you at the crossroads of Montana luxury and adventure.

The neighborhood is host to a variety of birds, deer, squirrels and rabbits. You'll meet walkers, runners, bikers and dogs with their owners hitting the local trails.

The neighborhood is minutes to down town, but feels miles away its very quiet, with the mature vegetation and beautiful views.
